revised_title: Crystal Field Effects and Co-operative State in Cubic LnNi2 Compounds
tldr: This article investigates the crystal field effects and co-operative state in cubic LnNi2 compounds. The authors apply the theory of the preceding paper to these compounds and find that it provides a satisfactory explanation of the observed saturation moments and Curie temperatures. They also estimate the crystal field and exchange interaction to explain the moments and temperatures throughout the series.
